job_history.work_description: Responsible for administrative and operational tasks, utilizing technology proficiently, acting as the quarterback for project coordination and teamwork, representing the leadership team and the company to partners, clients, and guests, finding new ways for the company to grow and flourish, and leading special projects with enthusiasm.

Assist the Executive Director with administrative management services, provide communication to all the Historic Park City merchants through various channels, coordinate special events and Main Street activities with Historic Park City merchants, plan and coordinate quarterly educational and informational events for HPCA members.

Keep the HPCA website current regarding calendar events, member promotions, meeting notices, merchant information, business landing pages and other information, blog updates, social media marketing and image manipulation for HPCA, Lange Group, Gorgoza, TMI and Goldminer’s Daughter.

Provided expert administrative support and created a first-rate customer service experience for Fieldhouse patrons, focused on customer relationship building and human connection with the front desk team, planned and executed events at The Fieldhouse annually.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in project coordination, leading special projects, and planning events, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has experience in leading teams, representing the leadership team, and providing expert administrative support, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has experience in providing communication to merchants, coordinating events, and managing social media, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Event Planning
skills.explanation: Has experience in planning and executing events, including quarterly educational events and Main Street activities, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Has experience in providing first-rate customer service, focusing on customer relationship building, and creating a positive experience for patrons, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Teamwork
skills.explanation: Has experience in working with teams, including the front desk team, and coordinating with merchants, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Marketing
skills.explanation: Has experience in social media marketing, blog updates, and image manipulation, suggesting a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in managing multiple tasks, including administrative and operational tasks, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Technology
skills.explanation: Has experience in utilizing technology proficiently, including managing websites and social media, suggesting a solid working proficiency.
